title: The Krusty the Clown Show
description: Krusty the Clown hosts his long-running variety kids show featuring physical jokes, comedy sketches, and special guests.
alt1: Krusty driving a litle circus car
alt2: Side Show Bob passionately reading a book
alt3: Krusty and Side Show Mel playing his slide whistle
alt4: Krusty smiling wide and holding an axe
